params._value: the max amount they can spend

approveAndCall(address,uint256).details: Approve spender to transfer tokens and then execute a callback on recipient.

params.amount: The amount allowed to be transferred
params.spender: The address allowed to transfer to

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).details: Approve spender to transfer tokens and then execute a callback on recipient.

params.amount: The amount allowed to be transferred.
params.data: Additional data with no specified format.
params.spender: The address allowed to transfer to.

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

params._value: the amount of money to burn

decrease_allowance(address,uint256).details: Decrease the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed_[_spender] == 0. To decrement allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) Emits an Approval event.

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params.value: The amount of tokens to decrease the allowance by.

increase_allowance(address,uint256).details: Increase the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender. approve should be called when allowed_[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) Emits an Approval event.

params.spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params.value: The amount of tokens to increase the allowance by.

params.mintedAmount: the amount of tokens it will receive

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferAndCall(address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens to a specified address and then execute a callback on recipient.

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).details: Transfer tokens to a specified address and then execute a callback on recipient.

params.data: Additional data with no specified format

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferFromAndCall(address,address,uint.details: Transfer tokens from one address to another and then execute a callback on recipient.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params.recipient: The address which you want to transfer to
params.sender: The address which you want to send tokens from

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferFromAndCall(address,address,uint.details: Transfer tokens from one address to another and then execute a callback on recipient.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.recipient: The address which you want to transfer to
params.sender: The address which you want to send tokens from

returns._0: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

airdropACTIVE(address[],uint256[]).notice: Run an ACTIVE Air-Drop It requires an array of all the addresses and amount of tokens to distribute It will only process first 100 recipients. That limit is fixed to prevent gas limit

approve(address,uint256).notice: Set allowance for other address Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf

burn(uint256).notice: Destroy tokens Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

changeSafeguardStatus().notice: Change safeguard status on or off When safeguard is true, then all the non-owner functions will stop working. When safeguard is false, then all the functions will resume working back again!

manualWithdrawTokens(uint256).notice: Owner can transfer tokens from contract to owner address When safeguard is true, then all the non-owner functions will stop working. When safeguard is false, then all the functions will resume working back again!

mintToken(address,uint256).notice: Create `mintedAmount` tokens and send it to `target`

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens from other address Send `_value` tokens to `_to` in behalf of `_from`
